attributes.action: Stop Mothers using there Children as a weapon.
attributes.additional_details: I have Live Facebook clips of me showing up but not collecting Damien because his mum has not shown up. I have been to Mediation and also know with Social Services.
attributes.background: My Son Damien has been withdrawn from me twice and for no reason other than spite and to use him as a weapon against me for moving on with my life.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
